data.title: Fox Broadcasting Company
data.meta_description: Document 28 - Free download as (.rtf), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses various changes that individuals would make to television markets and stations if they had more influence or control. Some proposed changes include bringing back old news formats, adding more local or national subchannels, reducing news time and paid programming, adding local sports coverage, and improving news quality and balance.
